title: Hextach Crafting Menu Bugged
body: Every time I try to open up the hextech crafting section in the main menu, it causes the league of legends client to stop working. Non of my friends seem to be having this issue so I am not sure if it is something that happened exclusively to my client during the last patch or if others are having the same issue. Any help on fixing this problem would be appreciated.

replies.body: Did you recently update Windows 10?  There's been an issue with the update that's causing some players to crash when loading hextech crafting.  This is might be the case for you, [rolling back the update](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) could result this in the meantime.  Hope that helps!

I am not using windows 10, currently using windows 8. Just tried doing the repair part on the patching area of league. After opening hextech crafting again it crashed the client. If you have any other ideas as to what is causing this it would be helpful.
Thanks for the follow up!  Are you using any third party programs, such as play.tv or Overwolf?  Turn them off, and see if this resolves the issue!
It seems to have been an issue with plays.tv. After I closed it i'm able to get into hextech crafting without any issues. Thanks for the help!
